author: Martijnsummer
post_text: October 7, 2014 at 3:55â€¯PM#1Hello fellow GrandMA2 users,i try to label a lot of cues with a uservariable. i have tried some options already:Assign Executor 1.201 Cue 3 /name= "test"does workSetUserVar $Label ("Set Label")Assign Executor 1.201 Cue 3 /name= $Labeldoesn't work. even is the label variable is "test" instead of just the word testSetUserVar $Label ("Set Label")Assign Executor 1.201 Cue 3 /name= "$Label"also doesn't work.does anyone have some ideas?thanks a lotwith kind regards,Martijn
title: label a cue by macro
